subject: Missing USB Cable in My Order
description_text:
Hi there, 
 First of all, thank you very much for the fast delivery — I really appreciate it! 
 However, I noticed that there was no USB cable included in my order. Could you please check if it was supposed to be part of the package? 
 Thanks in advance for your help! 
 
 Best regards, 
 Marvin

conversations.body_text: Hi Marvin Krzon,  Please provide your order number, contact name, phone number, and address. We will send you a replacement USB cable.
